entries.journal_entry_description: Kava wants you to help to frame Ind, a rival in Lady Valarian's organization.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Kavas said that she has had a tail on Ind for the last few days. This snitch will contact you to show you where Ind's safe house is.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: I don't trust comms for something like this. Too many people listening in on too many frequencies. Meet me at these coordinates.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: A call from Airba to set up the meeting.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Airba has been trailing Ind for a week now. Not trusting the comms he wants to have a face-to-face with you to tell you what he learned.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Airba won't take you to Ind's home himself, but he has given you coordinates. Something isn't right here though. Be careful.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: You are to locate Ind's house and steal his banking inforation. Labria has guided you to this house. You  need to search it for Ind's room.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: The security drod has done its job.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: The security droid was a surprise but you took care of it. Now its time to search the house, and find Ind's datapad. Once you have it you must hack into it and retrieve the his banking information.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: You have searched Ind's place and found the codes to his secret bank account. Return to Kavas.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Kavas wants you to knock off a courier carrying cash from the gambling operations from the Luck Despot to the bank.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Looks like the courier spotted you and is taking matters into his own hands. Take him out now.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: You got a bag full of strange and varied currency off of the courier. You swear that in addition to the colorful script, gems, and coins made of precious metals, there are clam shells, and nerf horns in there. Time to get this collection back to Kavas.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: Kavas' slicer, Bleena,  has had his specialized tool set stolen from him. Kavas needs Bleena to slice into Ind's account. The tool set was sold to some Jawas. Go and get it back.
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: You got the tool set back from the Jawa. Time to get back to Kavas with it.
entries.task14_journal_entry_description: You have completed the Thrust quest
